subject: Investing
title: BDCs: Lending for Yield
description: Learn BDCs: Lending for Yield in one minute.

hook.text: Business Development Companies lend to mid-size firms at 8-12% interestâ€”and pass most of it to shareholders.

buildup.text: BDCs fill the gap between bank loans and public bonds, providing credit to companies too small for Wall Street.

discovery.text: Like REITs, BDCs must distribute 90% of income, creating yields that often exceed 8%.

twist.text: High yields come with credit risk. When the economy weakens, borrower defaults can slash BDC income sharply.

climax.text: Choose BDCs with diversified loan books, low non-accruals, and management teams with strong track records.

punchline.text: BDCs let you play bankerâ€”high income, but only if borrowers pay you back.
